Description.content: If checked, an instance of the class executing the job is created only when the job is executed the first time. The instance is then used for all repetitions of the job. If unchecked, the job is performed by a new instance each time.

Description.content: If checked the job performed at the specified dates (see the cron expression). If unchecked, the job is still listed, but not performed.
